title: Rare opportunity to own a prime land in Mount Lavinia Templers Road
details:
12.6P flat square shaped bare land. 2nd Block from Templers Road on 30FT wide paved Road. (Templers Road numbers continue). 500m from Galle Road
.
Excellent for Commercial or Residential purposes.

This is a very rare opportunity to own a property of this nature on Templers Road.
Quick sale. Rupees 2.6 million per perch
